file_content.text: Enter Mayhem at the Arena Grand as a solo contender and battle for your chance to claim the Eternal Championship.
Enter Mayhem at the Arena Grand with the option of bringing along a group and battle for your chance to claim the Eternal Championship.

Defeat Supreme Vindicator Lanos during round 5 of Mayhem at the Arena Grand.
NOTE: This mission can only be completed while on [Solo] The Eternal Championship

Defeat Nocturno and Drake Raven during round 7 of Mayhem at the Arena Grand.
NOTE: This mission can only be completed while on [Solo] The Eternal Championship

Defeat Eternal Champion Zotar during round 10 of Mayhem at the Arena Grand.
NOTE: This mission can only be completed while on [Solo] The Eternal Championship
